Target is marked with XX but the mask and color will be 00

Vertical masks
--------------

Displace to the right the number of column (0-7)

A  B  C  D  E  F  G  H   Mask     Color

XX 00 11 11 11 11 11 11  01100000 00100000 A
10 XX 10 10 10 10 10 10  00000000 00000000 B
11 00 XX 10 10 10 10 10  11000000 10000000 C
00 00 00 XX 10 10 10 10  11100000 10000000 D
00 00 00 00 XX 10 10 10  11110000 10000000 E
00 00 00 00 00 XX 10 10  11111000 10000000 F
00 00 00 00 00 00 XX 10  11111100 10000000 G
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 XX  11111110 10000000 H

XX 00 00 00 00 00 00 00  01110000 00010000 A
10 XX 00 11 11 11 11 11  00110000 00010000 B
10 10 XX 10 10 10 10 10  00000000 00000000 C
11 11 00 XX 10 10 10 10  01100000 01000000 D
00 00 00 00 XX 10 10 10  01110000 01000000 E
00 00 00 00 00 XX 10 10  01111000 01000000 F
00 00 00 00 00 00 XX 10  01111100 01000000 G
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 XX  01111110 01000000 H

XX 00 00 00 00 00 00 00  01111000 00001000 A
10 XX 00 00 00 00 00 00  00111000 00001000 B
10 10 XX 00 11 11 11 11  00011000 00001000 C
10 10 10 XX 10 10 10 10  00000000 00000000 D
11 11 11 00 XX 10 10 10  00110000 00100000 E
00 00 00 00 00 XX 10 10  00111000 00100000 F
00 00 00 00 00 00 XX 10  00111100 00100000 G
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 XX  00111110 00100000 H

XX 00 00 00 00 00 00 00  01111100 00000100 A
10 XX 00 00 00 00 00 00  00111100 00000100 B
10 10 XX 00 00 00 00 00  00011100 00000100 C
10 10 10 XX 00 11 11 11  00001100 00000100 D
10 10 10 10 XX 10 10 10  00000000 00000000 E
11 11 11 11 00 XX 10 10  00011000 00010000 F
00 00 00 00 00 00 XX 10  00011100 00010000 G
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 XX  00011110 00010000 H

XX 00 00 00 00 00 00 00  01111110 00000010 A
10 XX 00 00 00 00 00 00  00111110 00000010 B
10 10 XX 00 00 00 00 00  00011110 00000010 C 
10 10 10 XX 00 00 00 00  00001110 00000010 D
10 10 10 10 XX 00 11 11  00000110 00000010 E
10 10 10 10 10 XX 10 10  00000000 00000000 F
11 11 11 11 11 00 XX 10  00001100 00001000 G
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 XX  00001110 00001000 H

XX 00 00 00 00 00 00 00  01111111 00000001 A
10 XX 00 00 00 00 00 00  00111111 00000001 B
10 10 XX 00 00 00 00 00  00011111 00000001 C
10 10 10 XX 00 00 00 00  00001111 00000001 D
10 10 10 10 XX 00 00 00  00000111 00000001 E
10 10 10 10 10 XX 00 11  00000011 00000001 F
10 10 10 10 10 10 XX 10  00000000 00000000 G
11 11 11 11 11 11 00 XX  00000110 00000100 H


Horizontal masks
----------------

X1100000 X0100000  60 20
X1110000 X0010000  70 10
X1111000 X0001000  78 08
X1111100 X0000100  7C 04
X1111110 X0000010  7E 02
X1111111 X0000001  7F 01

0X110000 0X010000  30 10
0X111000 0X001000  38 08
0X111100 0X000100  3C 04
0X111110 0X000010  3E 02
0X111111 0X000001  3F 01
0X000000 0X000000  00 00

00X11000 00X01000  18 80
00X11100 00X00100  1C 40
00X11110 00X00010  1E 20
00X11111 00X00001  1F 10
00X00000 00X00000  00 00
11X00000 10X00000  C0 80

000X1100 000X0100  0C 40
000X1110 000X0010  0E 20
000X1111 000X0001  0F 10
000X0000 000X0000  00 00
011X0000 010X0000  60 40
111X0000 100X0000  E0 80

0000X110 0000X010  06 02
0000X111 0000X001  07 01
0000X000 0000X000  00 00
0011X000 0010X000  30 20
0111X000 0100X000  70 40
1111X000 1000X000  F0 80

00000X11 00000X01  03 01
00000X00 00000X00  00 00
00011X00 00010X00  18 10
00111X00 00100X00  38 20
01111X00 01000X00  78 40
11111X00 10000X00  F8 80

000000X0 000000X0  00 00
000011X0 000010X0  0C 08
000111X0 000100X0  1C 10
001111X0 001000X0  3C 20
011111X0 010000X0  7C 40
111111X0 100000X0  FC 80

0000011X 0000010X  06 04
0000111X 0000100X  0E 08
0001111X 0001000X  1E 10
0011111X 0010000X  3E 20
0111111X 0100000X  7E 40
1111111X 1000000X  FE 80
